title: CloudFront to S3 secured with OAC
description: Create a CloudFront distribution with an S3 origin secured with origin access control (OAC).

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to deploy a CloudFront distribution with an S3 origin that is secured with origin access control (OAC). Compared to the older origin access identity (OAI) method OAC offers enhanced security practices, comprehensive HTTP methods support, and supports objects encrypted with SSE-KMS.
This pattern deploys one CloudFront distribution and one S3 Bucket.
